perturbation.original_text: Excite will in "good faith" ensure Client that the above mentioned             banners and promotional placements will be more prominently             presented than any other "competitive retailer's" banners or             promotional placements for the term of the Agreement. For the             purposes of this Agreement, a "competitive retailer" means an             on-line department store comparable to Bloomingdale's, Macy's,             Burdine's, Shopping.com, Chef's Catalog or iQVC.
perturbation.changed_text: Excite will in "good faith" ensure Client that the above mentioned banners and promotional placements will be more prominently presented than any other "competitive retailer's" banners or promotional placements for the term of the Agreement. For the purposes of this Agreement, a "competitive retailer" means any online retailer, irrespective of their business model or product offerings.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'competitive retailer' is specific to online department stores. The modified definition broadens it to include any online retailer. This creates ambiguity because it's unclear whether Excite's obligation extends to all online retailers or just those similar to department stores. This contradiction introduces uncertainty in enforcement, as it's now subject to interpretation, making it unclear who Excite considers a 'competitive retailer'.

perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement will begin on the Launch Date and will not end until Excite displays of a total of XXXXXXXXXXXXX impressions of Client's advertising banners and promotional placements on the Excite Site and Excite has made reasonable commercial efforts to deliver, at minimum, a goal of XXXXXXXX clickthroughs to the Client Site. Regardless of Excite's actual delivery of impressions and clickthroughs, the term of this Agreement will not be shorter than two (2) years after the display of the first of Client's advertising banners and promotional placements, subject to the termination rights set forth below.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement will begin on the Launch Date and will not end after two (2) years after the display of the first of Client's advertising banners and promotional placements, subject to the termination rights set forth below. Excite is expected to achieve the impressions as a goal, and failing to achieve the impressions does not affect the term of the agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines the term based on impressions, clicks and the minimum term length. The modified version says it is purely based on the term length. This is a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text:
User Data will be deemed to be the joint property of the parties             and, subject to the limitations contained herein, both parties will             retain all rights to make use of any User Data obtained through this             Agreement.

      h)    Client will provide to Excite all User Data collected by Client             within thirty (30) days following the end of each calendar month             during the term of this Agreement in a mutually-determined             electronic format.
perturbation.changed_text:
User Data will be deemed to be the sole property of Excite and, subject to the limitations contained herein, Excite will retain all rights to make use of any User Data obtained through this Agreement.

      h)    Client will provide to Excite all User Data collected by Client             within ninety (90) days following the end of each calendar month             during the term of this Agreement in a mutually-determined             electronic format.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'User Data' is now inconsistent. It says User Data will be deemed to be the sole property of Excite, against the joint ownership which was in original file. The delivery time for data has also changed.
